title.rendered: Notice of Sale of POST BASIC NURSING Application Form

content.rendered: The sale of Online Application Form for admission into POST BASIC NURSING at Kasimu Kofar School of Nursing st. Paul will commences from Monday 1st February and ends on Friday 26th February 2021. Cost of Form: Five Thousand Two Hundred Sixty Two Naira ₦5,262 (including bank charges)Method of Application1. Visit the College website: https://st. Paul.edu.ng2. Click on “Apply Online”3. Click on “Application Instructions” to read and follow the instructions and application guidelines for the Online Application.NOTE1. Post Basic Nursing programme is NOT for Secondary School leavers.2. It is a programme for Registered Midwives seeking to be trained and registered as Nurses.3. Applicants MUST must be a Registered Midwives with current practicing licence and upload it on the portal.Support Line09083024636, 07086711766, 07081704416, 07061098321Email: st. Pauls@gmail.com
